chapters.title: Chapter 15: Gathering Darkness
chapters.info: Catrelle Mosenain, p. 388 (465)—Daughter of an ironmonger from Maerone. Daved Hanlon split her head with a rock before tossing her down a well after she accused him of getting her with child. Hanlon himself had forgotten her name, but Shiaine appears to remember. See also Hanlon, Daved.
